item.title: Wandering the Lake District
item.author: Mark Bruggemann,
item.description: Day 1: The Journey At the usual time of 17:30hrs, ten Fellwanderers met at the Union to embark upon the annual Winter Tour, this year to the Lake District. After introductions, Matt and Ping on their first trip, discussion immediately turned to the anticipated freezing conditions — photos from the …

item.title: Cage loses his shit... in 3D
item.author: Mark Bruggemann,Jade Hoffman,
item.description: When a film uses the suffix of “3D” in its title, it comes with several expectations. Not only does this generally promise an excessive, gratuitous use of 3D, but it also often means that the film will be entirely ludicrous from start to finish Enter Nicolas Cage in Drive Angry 3D. This film not …
